src_path: 113-1/中國文學/報告/論聊齋誌異·促織的社會諷喻與歷史隱喻_v1.pdf
title: 論《聊齋誌異·促織》的社會諷喻與歷史隱喻
author: 吳亞倫
summary: 本報告探討蒲松齡的《聊齋誌異·促織》如何透過奇幻故事諷刺封建社會的權力結構與社會不公。報告從〈促織〉的故事梗概與主題入手，分析蒲松齡如何藉由蟋蟀的故事，隱喻百姓在荒唐制度下的悲苦處境，並對比明朝歷史事件，揭示故事背後對當代社會的批判。
section_range: 一、緒論:〈促織〉的故事梗概與主題; 二、蒲松齡的諷刺與社會批判; 三、〈促織〉的歷史原型與明清社會的映射; 四、結語:蒲松齡的時代意義

src_path: 113-1/中國文學/報告/唐傳奇的意志世界_論文評述_v1.pdf
title: 樂蘅軍〈唐傳奇的意志世界〉論文評述
author: 吳亞倫
summary: 本文評述樂蘅軍教授的論文《意志與命運：中國古典小說世界觀綜論》中的首篇章節〈唐傳奇的意志世界〉。文章首先介紹了樂蘅軍以心理學和唯意志論為基礎，提出唐傳奇故事發展的關鍵在於人物意志的觀點。接著，本文進一步探討了唐傳奇中人物意志的展現，並提出作者意識與作品互動的重要性。最後，文章質疑了將西方心理學應用於中國傳統文學研究的適切性，並強調了唐傳奇所展現的浪漫主義精神。

src_path: 113-1/全民國防教育軍事訓練/簡報/以色列培育資安國防人才的模式與臺灣全民國防的借鏡_v2.pdf
title: 研究簡報內容：以色列培育資安國防人才的模式與臺灣全民國防的借鏡
author: 吳亞倫
summary: 本簡報探討以色列如何透過教育和軍事結合的模式，培養頂尖資安國防人才，並分析此模式對臺灣全民國防建設的借鏡意義。簡報內容涵蓋全球資安挑戰、以色列的領導地位、臺灣的困境，以及以色列資安人才培養模式的特色和成果，最後提出對臺灣的策略建議。
section_range: 研究背景與主題; 研究動機; 以色列資安人才培養模式; 臺灣現狀分析; 問題對比; 策略建議; 結論與未來展望

src_path: 113-1/全民國防教育軍事訓練/報告/以色列培育資安國防人才的模式與臺灣全民國防的借鏡_v1.pdf
title: 113-1 全民國防教育軍事訓練課程 期中研究計畫 - 以色列培育資安國防人才的模式與臺灣全民國防的借鏡
author: 吳亞倫
summary: 本研究計畫旨在探討以色列如何透過軍事訓練與教育體系，培育資安專業人才，並分析其模式對臺灣全民國防的借鏡價值。研究將聚焦於以色列在義務役階段主動篩選資安人才進入網軍部隊的機制，以及其對臺灣的啟示，並思考如何改善國軍義務役在人民心中的「浪費時間」形象，使其成為高知識人才發揮所長的領域。
section_range: 一、 研究主題; 二、 研究動機; 三、 預期貢獻; 四、 探討問題

src_path: 113-1/全民國防教育軍事訓練/簡報/以色列培育資安國防人才的模式與臺灣全民國防的借鏡_v1.pdf
title: 研究簡報內容：以色列培育資安國防人才的模式與臺灣全民國防的借鏡
author: 吳亞倫
summary: 本簡報探討以色列如何透過教育和軍事結合的模式，培養頂尖資安國防人才，並分析此模式對臺灣全民國防建設的借鏡意義。簡報內容涵蓋全球資安挑戰、以色列的領導地位、臺灣的困境，以及以色列資安人才培養模式的特色和成果，最後提出對臺灣的策略建議。
section_range: 研究背景與主題; 研究動機; 以色列資安人才培養模式; 臺灣現狀分析; 問題對比; 策略建議; 結論與未來展望

title: Homework 1
author: 吳亞倫
summary: This document contains solutions to calculus problems from sections 5-1 and 5-2, covering topics such as limits, areas under curves, and integration. It includes detailed calculations and explanations for each problem.

title: HW3
author: 吳亞倫
summary: This document presents solutions to calculus problems, primarily focusing on integration techniques such as substitution and integration by parts. It covers sections 7.1 and 7.2, with detailed steps and explanations for each solution.

title: HW4
author: 吳亞倫
summary: This document contains calculus problems and solutions related to sections 7.4 and 7.5, focusing on techniques for evaluating integrals, including partial fraction decomposition and trigonometric substitution. It also briefly touches upon section 3-4, related to function.

title: HW4
author: 吳亞倫
summary: This document covers various calculus topics, including differentiation, implicit differentiation, and the evaluation of integrals. It features problems from sections 3-4, 3-5, 3-6, 3-10, with a focus on applying differentiation and integration rules.

title: HW2
author: 吳亞倫
summary: This document includes solutions to calculus problems involving integration, specifically focusing on sections 5.4, 5.5, and 6.1. It covers definite and indefinite integrals, area calculations, and the use of substitution for integration.

title: Summary of Curve Sketching
author: Ya-Ju Tsai
summary: This document provides guidelines for sketching curves in calculus, covering domain, intercepts, symmetry, asymptotes, intervals of increase or decrease, local maximum and minimum values, concavity, and points of inflection. It also includes examples of finding slant asymptotes and sketching the graph of a function.
intended_use: Educational material for a Calculus 1 course

title: Linear Approximations and Differentials
author: Ya-Ju Tsai
summary: This document covers linear approximations and differentials, explaining how to use the tangent line to approximate a curve and defining linear approximation and linearization. It includes examples of estimating values using linear approximation and discusses differentials and their application in estimating changes.
intended_use: Educational material for a Calculus 1 course

title: Derivatives of Logarithmic and Inverse Trigonometric Functions
author: Ya-Ju Tsai
summary: This document discusses derivatives of logarithmic and inverse trigonometric functions. It covers logarithmic functions, their derivatives, logarithmic differentiation, the number e as a limit, inverse trigonometric functions, and their derivatives. It provides formulas and examples for computing derivatives using these functions.
intended_use: Educational material for a Calculus 1 course

title: The Indefinite Integral and the Substitution Rule
author: Ya-Ju Tsai
summary: This document covers indefinite integrals and the substitution rule. It discusses the notation and application of indefinite integrals and provides a detailed explanation of the substitution rule for both indefinite and definite integrals. It also includes examples of how to apply the substitution rule to compute integrals.
intended_use: Educational material for a Calculus 2 course

title: Differential Rules (Part 2)
author: Ya-Ju Tsai
summary: This document covers advanced differentiation topics, including the chain rule and implicit differentiation. It defines implicit functions and provides examples of how to find the derivative of implicitly defined functions. The document also explores the concept of inverse functions and their derivatives.
intended_use: Educational material for a Calculus 1 course
